Class Manager

Manager of (virtual or not) series.

Allows to decompose series in other user-defined series. Let say that you have a serie W with itemSize=6, meaning that items are potentially components of symmetric rank 2 tensors of dimension 3. Then, using this library, it is possible to get names and underlaying series of decompositions. For instance, it is possible to get the components (itemSize=1), eigen values (itemSize=1), eigen vectors(itemSize=3)... from this original W serie.
